Photography & Lightroom

Learn how to take amazing photos in Bali

Sign Up

Photography & Lightroom Editing

Your local expert:

Bio:

Emilio is an entrepreneur, traveller and self-taught photographer with a love for adventure.

Follow his adventures on instagram @eyes_of_a_nomad

Sign up now and receive 20% off this learning experience!

SIGN UP

Course Details:

Location: Bali, Indonesia

Duration: 2 days

Level: Beginner

Price: $250 USD

What you'll learn:

Step up your game and learn photography and lightroom while exploring some of the most scenic locations in Bali.

Where we'll be:

Canggu, Bali

What I'll provide:

I will teach you how to take awesome photos in some of the most iconic locations in Bali. We will meet early in the morning to shoot the sunrise and then depending on weather and preferences, we will continue to other scenic locations around Canggu. After lunch we will export and edit your pictures together in Lightroom.

Good to know

Make sure you have space on your camera's memory card as well as your harddrive on your laptop. We will shoot in RAW which takes up quite a lot of space. It might be a good idea to bring an external harddrive or USB, but not required.

Where we'll meet:

Canggu, Bali
